snippet: Intelligence reports indicate that the government of President Bashar al-Assad has regained a tactical initiative, drawing on Hezbollah fighters, government militias and its advantage in heavy weaponry.
abstract: Intelligence reports indicate that government of Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad has regained tactical initiative, drawing on Hezbollah fighters, government militias and its advantage in heavy weaponry.

byline.original: By MARK MAZZETTI and MICHAEL R. GORDON

lead_paragraph: Intelligence reports indicate that the government of President Bashar al-Assad has regained a tactical initiative, drawing on Hezbollah fighters, government militias and its advantage in heavy weaponry.

headline.main: Syrian Forces Seen Stepping Up Air Attacks on Rebels
